tags_legend.yc-rfs: Directly inspired by YC's official Request for Startups
tags_legend.yc-funded-category: Category already seeing YC funding and traction
tags_legend.ai-native: AI is core to the product, not bolted on
tags_legend.deep-tech: Requires significant R&D or technical moat
tags_legend.regulated-market: Operates in a regulated space — healthcare, finance, gov
tags_legend.infrastructure: Developer tools or foundational platform layer
tags_legend.startup-potential: Real business potential with market-validated demand

ideas.title: AI Product Manager — Cursor for PMs
ideas.problem: Engineering teams have Cursor and Claude Code to write software, but the hardest part — figuring out what to build, synthesizing user research, and writing requirements — is still entirely manual and takes weeks.
ideas.concept: Upload customer interviews, usage data, and feedback → AI synthesizes them, recommends what to build next, generates PRD drafts, Figma change proposals, and Jira tickets automatically.
ideas.target_user: Startup founders, product managers, and solo technical founders doing 0-to-1 product discovery
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — Cursor for Product Managers (Andrew Miklas)

ideas.title: AI-Native Hedge Fund Infrastructure
ideas.problem: Established hedge funds are too slow to adopt AI due to compliance inertia. The next generation of quant funds will be AI-first, but no one is building the infrastructure stack for them.
ideas.concept: A platform where AI agent swarms autonomously scan 10-Ks, earnings calls, SEC filings, and news to generate and execute novel trading strategies — with a human-in-the-loop approval layer.
ideas.target_user: Quant researchers and finance-trained technologists building next-gen investment firms
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — AI-Native Hedge Funds (Charlie Holtz)

ideas.title: AI-Native Agency OS
ideas.problem: Traditional agencies (design, legal, marketing, ad) are bottlenecked by headcount. AI can now produce agency-quality output at software margins, but no operational platform exists to run these new model firms.
ideas.concept: A workflow OS for AI-first agencies: client intake, brief-to-output pipelines, AI generation layers, approval workflows, and delivery — without adding headcount.
ideas.target_user: Entrepreneurs building AI-native design studios, ad agencies, or legal doc firms
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — AI-Native Agencies (Aaron Epstein)

ideas.title: Stablecoin Yield & Banking Layer
ideas.problem: Stablecoins sit idle in wallets or on-chain with no access to yield-bearing accounts or traditional financial products — a $200B+ opportunity left on the table.
ideas.concept: A compliant stablecoin financial platform offering yield-bearing accounts, cross-border payments, and access to tokenized real-world assets — bridging DeFi returns with TradFi compliance.
ideas.target_user: Crypto-native businesses and individuals in emerging markets needing stable, yield-bearing financial accounts
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — Stablecoin Financial Services (Daivik Goel)

ideas.title: AI Intake & Processing Platform for Government
ideas.problem: Local and federal governments are drowning in forms, applications, and documents — printed out and processed by hand — while the AI wave sends even more digital submissions their way.
ideas.concept: An AI document processing platform that reads, classifies, validates, and routes government forms — from building permits to benefits applications — with a 90% automation rate.
ideas.target_user: City and county governments digitizing their administrative workflows
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — AI for Government (Tom Blomfield)

ideas.title: AI-Guided Physical Skills Training (AR/Wearable)
ideas.problem: Expert human trainers are expensive, geographically limited, and unavailable at the moment a worker or athlete needs correction. Most physical skill transfer still happens through in-person apprenticeship.
ideas.concept: A wearable or phone-based computer vision system that watches physical tasks in real time — welding, surgery, carpentry, sports technique — and gives step-by-step spoken guidance like a co-pilot.
ideas.target_user: Trade schools, surgical training programs, and enterprise manufacturing training teams
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — AI Guidance for Physical Work (David Lieb)

ideas.title: Software-Defined Metal Mill (Aluminum / Steel)
ideas.problem: US aluminum and steel mills have 8–30 week lead times due to decades-old production planning software, high energy costs, and manual quality control — making domestic metal uncompetitive.
ideas.concept: Build a modern mill with AI-driven production scheduling, real-time MES, automated changeovers, and smart energy management — producing domestic metal at shorter lead times and higher margins.
ideas.target_user: Industrial manufacturers and supply chains that can't wait 20+ weeks for domestic aluminum or steel
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — Modern Metal Mills (Zane Hengsperger)

ideas.title: AI Medical Billing Automation
ideas.problem: Medical billing is a $350B industry still largely handled by humans entering codes, chasing denials, and managing appeals — with error rates causing $125B in lost revenue annually.
ideas.concept: An AI agent that reads clinical notes, auto-generates ICD/CPT codes, submits claims, and autonomously handles denials and appeals — integrated with major EHR systems.
ideas.target_user: Independent medical practices and outpatient clinics with 1–50 providers
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Taxo, Akasa AI (medical billing automation)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Legal Document Factory
ideas.problem: Small businesses and startups spend $5,000–$50,000 on routine legal documents — NDAs, employment contracts, equity agreements — that large firms template in hours.
ideas.concept: A legal document generation platform where AI produces jurisdiction-specific, review-ready legal docs in minutes based on business context — with attorney review as an optional add-on.
ideas.target_user: Startup founders, small business owners, and freelancers needing legal docs without law firm prices
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — AI-Native Agencies (law firm use case)

ideas.title: Automated Hospital Quality Reporting
ideas.problem: Hospitals spend millions annually on staff manually compiling quality metrics for CMS, Joint Commission, and state regulators — a slow, error-prone compliance burden.
ideas.concept: AI agents that continuously monitor clinical data, auto-populate regulatory quality reports, flag anomalies before submission, and maintain audit-ready documentation.
ideas.target_user: Quality improvement departments at mid-sized regional hospitals and health systems
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Pharos (automated hospital quality reporting)

ideas.title: AI Accounting Automation for SMBs
ideas.problem: Small businesses spend 10+ hours a week on bookkeeping, reconciliation, and tax prep — tasks that are entirely rule-based and ripe for automation but still require expensive accountants.
ideas.concept: An AI-native accounting platform that auto-categorizes transactions, reconciles accounts, prepares financial statements, and flags issues — with a human CPA on-call for edge cases.
ideas.target_user: Small businesses with $500K–$10M in annual revenue using QuickBooks or Xero
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Tabular (accounting automation)

ideas.title: Memory Layer for Enterprise AI Agents
ideas.problem: Enterprise AI agents forget context between sessions, making them unreliable for multi-step workflows — each conversation starts from scratch, wasting time and breaking continuity.
ideas.concept: A persistent memory infrastructure layer that gives AI agents long-term memory across sessions, users, and workflows — with role-based access, versioning, and privacy controls.
ideas.target_user: Enterprise teams deploying AI agents for customer support, sales, and internal operations
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Mem0 (memory layer for LLM applications)

ideas.title: LLM Fine-Tuning & Inference Cloud for Regulated Industries
ideas.problem: Healthcare, legal, and financial companies can't use generic public LLMs due to data privacy laws — but fine-tuning and hosting their own models is prohibitively expensive.
ideas.concept: A managed cloud platform for fine-tuning, deploying, and inferencing open-source LLMs within a HIPAA/SOC2-compliant environment — no ML team required.
ideas.target_user: CTOs at healthcare groups, law firms, and financial institutions needing private AI
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Pipeshift (LLM fine-tuning and inference platform)

ideas.title: AI-Native Sales Development Platform
ideas.problem: SDR teams spend 70% of their time on research, sequencing, and personalization — work that AI can now do better and faster, yet most CRMs still rely on humans to do it manually.
ideas.concept: An AI agent that researches prospects, writes personalized outbound sequences, books meetings, and handles objections — acting as a full SDR team for a fraction of the cost.
ideas.target_user: B2B SaaS founders and sales leaders with a sales team of 1–20 reps
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: multiple AI SDR companies (Artisan, 11x)

ideas.title: Cross-Border Stablecoin Payment Rails
ideas.problem: International wire transfers cost 5–7% in fees and take 3–5 business days. For SMBs paying overseas contractors or suppliers, this is a painful, slow tax on global trade.
ideas.concept: A B2B payment platform using stablecoin rails for near-instant, near-zero-fee international payments — with compliance, FX conversion, and multi-currency invoicing built in.
ideas.target_user: Startups and SMBs with international teams, contractors, or suppliers in emerging markets
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — Stablecoin Financial Services; Winter 2025 — Fintech 2.0

ideas.title: AI Clinical Trial Matching Platform
ideas.problem: 80% of clinical trials fail to meet enrollment targets, costing pharma companies $600K–$8M per day in delays — while millions of eligible patients never hear about relevant trials.
ideas.concept: An AI platform that matches patients to clinical trials using their EHR data, actively notifies referring physicians, and handles pre-screening paperwork automatically.
ideas.target_user: Academic medical centers and CROs managing Phase II–III trials in oncology, rare disease, and neurology
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: clinical trial enrollment automation

ideas.title: AI Drug Discovery Target Identifier
ideas.problem: Identifying viable drug targets is a 5–10 year, billion-dollar process largely driven by trial and error across genomic, proteomic, and literature data that no human team can synthesize at scale.
ideas.concept: A foundation model trained on biological data (protein structures, genomics, literature) that identifies novel drug targets, predicts binding affinity, and prioritizes candidates for wet lab validation.
ideas.target_user: Biotech startups and pharma R&D teams in early discovery stages
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: drug discovery foundation models

ideas.title: AI-Powered Security Compliance Automation
ideas.problem: SOC 2, ISO 27001, and HIPAA compliance takes 6–18 months of manual evidence collection for growing startups — a process that slows enterprise sales and costs $100K+ in consulting fees.
ideas.concept: A platform that continuously monitors your infrastructure, auto-collects evidence, answers auditor questions, and maintains compliance posture across multiple frameworks simultaneously.
ideas.target_user: B2B SaaS startups needing SOC 2 Type II to close enterprise deals
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC W18: Vanta ($4.2B valuation) — security compliance automation

ideas.title: Vertical AI Agent for Construction Project Management
ideas.problem: Construction projects run 20% over budget and 80% over schedule on average — largely due to fragmented communication, manual RFI tracking, and delayed change order processing.
ideas.concept: An AI agent that sits in the project management workflow, tracks submittals and RFIs, predicts schedule risks, auto-drafts change orders, and surfaces issues before they become delays.
ideas.target_user: General contractors managing commercial projects in the $5M–$200M range
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — Next-Generation Construction Technology

ideas.title: AI Public Safety Dispatch Optimizer
ideas.problem: 911 dispatch centers operate on 40-year-old CAD systems with no AI triage, leading to slow response times, misrouted units, and preventable escalations.
ideas.concept: An AI layer on top of existing CAD systems that triages incoming calls, recommends optimal unit dispatch, predicts call volume surges, and flags repeat callers for pre-emptive outreach.
ideas.target_user: Mid-sized city and county dispatch centers processing 50,000–500,000 calls per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — Public Safety Technologies

ideas.title: Robotic Last-Mile Delivery Fleet
ideas.problem: Last-mile delivery costs $10–$12 per package and accounts for 53% of total logistics costs — yet only 1 YC company is addressing this $200B market.
ideas.concept: A fleet of autonomous sidewalk delivery robots operating in dense urban neighborhoods — subscription-based for restaurants, pharmacies, and grocery stores within a 2-mile radius.
ideas.target_user: Urban restaurant groups, pharmacies, and grocery chains in high-density zip codes
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC batch analysis: notably underfunded category in 2025 cohorts

ideas.title: AI-Powered Chip Design Assistant
ideas.problem: Semiconductor design is a bottleneck for the AI hardware arms race — chip tapeouts take 18–24 months and require teams of specialized engineers that take years to train.
ideas.concept: An LLM fine-tuned on RTL code, datasheets, and design patterns that assists chip architects with RTL generation, verification, and timing closure — compressing design cycles by 30–50%.
ideas.target_user: Fabless semiconductor startups and large tech companies with custom silicon programs
ideas.market_size: ~$60B EDA and chip design tools market
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — LLMs for Chip Design

ideas.title: Personalized AI Tutor Platform
ideas.problem: The global student-to-teacher ratio makes truly personalized education impossible at scale. Students fall behind in silence and costly tutoring is available only to affluent families.
ideas.concept: A Socratic AI tutor that adapts its teaching style to each student's learning pace, identifies misconceptions in real time, and builds a persistent knowledge model across subjects and time.
ideas.target_user: K–12 students and their parents in markets with inadequate access to private tutoring
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2025 — AI Tutors; Summer 2024 — Education AI

ideas.title: AI-Powered Immigration Case Management
ideas.problem: US immigration law firms process 100,000+ visa and green card applications per year using manual data entry, PDF forms, and email — cases average 18 months with constant status uncertainty.
ideas.concept: An end-to-end immigration case platform with AI form filling, document collection, status tracking, attorney-client communication, and USCIS portal integration.
ideas.target_user: Mid-sized immigration law firms handling 500–5,000 cases per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: immigration tech vertical SaaS

ideas.title: Vertical AI for Mental Health Practice Management
ideas.problem: Mental health practices lose 30–40% of potential revenue to administrative burden — session notes, insurance billing, scheduling, and prior authorizations — done manually by therapists.
ideas.concept: An AI platform that auto-transcribes therapy sessions (with consent), generates SOAP notes, handles insurance pre-auth, and submits claims — so therapists spend 100% of their time with patients.
ideas.target_user: Group mental health practices with 5–50 therapists using EHR platforms
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Nabla, Heidi Health (ambient clinical AI)

ideas.title: AI Supply Chain Visibility & Risk Platform
ideas.problem: Global supply chains have no real-time visibility into tier-2 and tier-3 supplier disruptions until it's too late — companies learn about issues 30–90 days after they begin.
ideas.concept: An AI platform that monitors supplier news, geopolitical signals, satellite data, and logistics feeds to surface supply chain risks 2–6 weeks before they materialize.
ideas.target_user: VP-level supply chain leaders at mid-market and enterprise manufacturers ($100M–$5B revenue)
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC Summer 2024 — Supply Chain Resilience

ideas.title: AI Paralegal for Contract Review
ideas.problem: In-house legal teams at growth-stage companies review hundreds of vendor contracts, NDAs, and partner agreements per year — each one taking 2–8 hours of lawyer time at $300–$800/hr.
ideas.concept: An AI paralegal that reviews contracts against a company's standard playbook, flags deviations with risk ratings, suggests redlines, and tracks negotiation history across counterparties.
ideas.target_user: In-house legal teams and CLOs at Series A–C B2B startups
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: SpellBook, Ironclad (AI contract review)

ideas.title: Real-Time AI Customer Support Agent
ideas.problem: SaaS companies spend 20–40% of headcount on customer support for issues that are entirely repetitive and well-documented — first response times average 8+ hours on email channels.
ideas.concept: An AI agent that handles Tier 1 and Tier 2 support tickets end-to-end — trained on product docs, past tickets, and runbooks — resolving 70–80% without human escalation.
ideas.target_user: B2B SaaS companies with $1M–$20M ARR and growing support backlogs
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: multiple AI support cos (Intercom Fin, Sierra)

ideas.title: Precision Fermentation Protein Company
ideas.problem: Animal agriculture produces 15% of global greenhouse emissions and cannot scale to feed 10 billion people. Plant proteins fail on taste and texture. Lab-grown meat remains expensive.
ideas.concept: Use precision fermentation to produce specific animal proteins (casein, whey, egg whites) at cost parity with conventional sources — enabling products indistinguishable from animal originals.
ideas.target_user: Food manufacturers wanting to launch animal-free versions of dairy and egg products
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Sustainable Food Systems; YC-funded: Perfect Day, Remilk

ideas.title: Grid-Scale Battery Storage Startup
ideas.problem: Renewable energy is now the cheapest form of power generation, but the grid can't store solar and wind output — making fossil peakers necessary to meet demand spikes.
ideas.concept: A next-generation grid-scale battery using a novel chemistry (sodium-ion, iron-air, or vanadium flow) offering lower cost, longer duration, and safer operation than lithium-ion.
ideas.target_user: Utilities, energy developers, and industrial facilities with high renewable penetration targets
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Energy Storage; Winter 2025 — Climate Tech

ideas.title: Carbon Capture as a Service
ideas.problem: Voluntary carbon markets are flooded with low-quality offsets. Corporate buyers need verified, durable carbon removal at scale — but direct air capture costs $400–$1,000 per ton.
ideas.concept: A distributed network of enhanced weathering or biomass carbon removal units deployed on farmland — sold to corporates on a $/ton subscription with third-party MRV built in.
ideas.target_user: Fortune 500 sustainability teams with net-zero commitments needing high-quality removals by 2030
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Carbon Capture & Removal

ideas.title: AI-Powered Vertical Farming OS
ideas.problem: Vertical farming has failed commercially because energy costs and operational complexity are too high relative to yield — operators have no AI-driven system to optimize the thousands of variables.
ideas.concept: A full-stack OS for vertical farms: automated climate control, computer vision crop monitoring, yield prediction, and AI-optimized lighting/nutrient dosing — reducing OpEx by 40%.
ideas.target_user: Vertical farming operators with 10,000–100,000 sq ft of growing space
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Sustainable Agriculture

ideas.title: AI Infrastructure for US Reshoring Manufacturers
ideas.problem: Companies bringing manufacturing back to the US face a skilled labor shortage — there simply aren't enough workers with the tribal knowledge to run advanced production lines.
ideas.concept: An AI + robotics integration platform that captures existing worker knowledge, automates repetitive tasks, and trains new workers using AR-guided procedures — making reshoring economically viable.
ideas.target_user: Mid-market US manufacturers ($50M–$500M revenue) building new domestic production lines
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — US-Based Manufacturing; Summer 2024 — Industrial AI

ideas.title: AI-Powered Healthcare Staffing Marketplace
ideas.problem: Hospitals face a critical nursing shortage with 3M+ open roles in the US. Travel nurse agencies charge 200–300% markups. Scheduling is done in spreadsheets.
ideas.concept: An AI-driven healthcare staffing marketplace that matches credentialed nurses and allied health workers to open shifts at hospitals — with credential verification, payroll, and compliance built in.
ideas.target_user: Hospital system HR leaders and nurse managers managing 50+ open shifts per week
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Clipboard Health (healthcare staffing marketplace)

ideas.title: Embedded Finance Infrastructure for Vertical SaaS
ideas.problem: Vertical SaaS companies (property management, dental, HVAC) have captive customers who do all their business through the software — but payments still happen outside the platform, leaking revenue.
ideas.concept: An embedded finance SDK that lets vertical SaaS companies add payments, lending, insurance, and cards to their product in weeks — without becoming a financial institution.
ideas.target_user: Vertical SaaS founders at $2M–$20M ARR ready to monetize their payment flow
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — Fintech 2.0; YC-funded: Increase, Unit (embedded banking)

ideas.title: AI-Native Property Management Platform
ideas.problem: Property managers handle 200–500 units per person using a mix of outdated software, spreadsheets, and phone calls for leasing, maintenance, and tenant communication.
ideas.concept: An AI-native property management OS where an AI agent handles inbound tenant requests, routes maintenance work orders, screens applicants, and drafts leases — automating 60% of daily tasks.
ideas.target_user: Independent property management companies managing 200–5,000 residential units
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Doorstead, Belong (property management AI)

ideas.title: Decentralized Identity Verification Protocol
ideas.problem: Every app re-verifies identity from scratch — users hand over their most sensitive data (passport, SSN, selfie) to dozens of companies who store it insecurely.
ideas.concept: A self-sovereign identity protocol where users verify once, receive a ZK-proof of their credentials, and share verifiable proof with any service without revealing the underlying data.
ideas.target_user: Fintech, healthcare, and crypto applications needing KYC/AML compliance without centralized data liability
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Decentralized Identity

ideas.title: AI Copilot for Insurance Underwriting
ideas.problem: Commercial insurance underwriters manually review hundreds of pages of submissions per deal — a process taking days that could be compressed to minutes with AI document intelligence.
ideas.concept: An AI underwriting workbench that ingests submissions (ACORD forms, financial docs, loss runs), extracts structured risk signals, scores exposures, and drafts quote terms — with a human approval layer.
ideas.target_user: Commercial lines underwriters at MGAs, carriers, and Lloyd's syndicates
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Federato, EigenRisk (underwriting AI)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Precision Agriculture Platform
ideas.problem: Farmers apply fertilizer, pesticide, and water uniformly across fields despite massive variation in soil composition, crop health, and microclimate — wasting 30–50% of inputs.
ideas.concept: A satellite + drone image processing platform that generates field-level prescription maps for variable-rate fertilizer and irrigation, integrated with John Deere and AGCO precision equipment.
ideas.target_user: Large row crop farmers (1,000+ acres) and farm management companies
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Sustainable Agriculture / Precision Farming

ideas.title: AI-Native Revenue Cycle Management
ideas.problem: Healthcare providers lose $262B annually to claim denials, underpayments, and billing inefficiencies — managed by RCM teams doing manual work in fragmented legacy systems.
ideas.concept: An AI-native RCM platform that predicts and prevents denials before submission, auto-appeals with clinical documentation, and benchmarks reimbursement against payer contracts.
ideas.target_user: Multi-specialty physician groups and ambulatory surgery centers with $10M–$100M in annual collections
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Akuity Health, Cedar (healthcare billing AI)

ideas.title: AI-First Talent Intelligence Platform
ideas.problem: Enterprise talent acquisition teams review thousands of resumes manually, make biased decisions based on school pedigree, and miss strong candidates in non-traditional backgrounds.
ideas.concept: An AI talent intelligence platform that assesses candidates on demonstrated skills (GitHub, portfolio, work samples), predicts job performance, and auto-ranks pipelines — blind to demographic signals.
ideas.target_user: Head of talent and CHROs at Series B+ startups and mid-market companies hiring 50–500 people per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Karat, Vervoe (skills-based hiring)

ideas.title: Tokenized Real-World Asset Trading Platform
ideas.problem: Real estate, private credit, and infrastructure assets are illiquid, minimum investments are $100K+, and settlement takes weeks — locking out 99% of investors.
ideas.concept: A regulated platform that tokenizes real-world assets as on-chain securities, enables fractional ownership from $100, and provides secondary liquidity through a compliant order book.
ideas.target_user: Asset managers wanting to broaden their investor base and retail investors wanting access to private markets
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — Stablecoin Financial Services (tokenized RWA)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Freight Brokerage
ideas.problem: Traditional freight brokers charge 15–20% margins and operate via phone calls and email chains. Load matching is manual, carrier vetting is inconsistent, and pricing is opaque.
ideas.concept: An AI freight brokerage that instantly matches loads to carriers using real-time data (lane pricing, carrier performance, capacity signals), with AI negotiating rates and tracking shipments.
ideas.target_user: Mid-market shippers ($5M–$100M freight spend) and mid-sized carriers with 10–100 trucks
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded: Convoy, Transfix (digital freight brokerage)

ideas.title: Next-Gen Nuclear Fission Microreactor
ideas.problem: Energy-intensive industries (data centers, industrial manufacturers, remote communities) need always-on, zero-carbon power that solar and wind cannot reliably provide.
ideas.concept: A factory-built, walkaway-safe nuclear microreactor (1–20 MW) deployable at industrial sites — providing 24/7 carbon-free baseload power at grid parity with a 60-year operating life.
ideas.target_user: Data center operators, mining companies, and remote industrial facilities needing off-grid clean power
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Nuclear Energy; YC-funded: Radiant (nuclear microreactor)

ideas.title: AI-Native Audit & Financial Controls Platform
ideas.problem: Internal audit departments at mid-market companies run annual controls testing on spreadsheets — missing continuous risks and spending months on sampling instead of full-population testing.
ideas.concept: A continuous audit platform that monitors every transaction against control rules in real time, flags anomalies for auditor review, and auto-generates board-ready risk reports.
ideas.target_user: CAEs and CFOs at companies with $50M–$500M revenue going through growth or IPO-readiness
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: AuditBoard, Workiva (audit and controls)

ideas.title: AI Wellness Coach for Chronic Disease Management
ideas.problem: 150M Americans have at least one chronic disease (diabetes, hypertension, obesity). Between doctor visits, they receive no behavioral guidance — and 50% are non-adherent to their treatment plans.
ideas.concept: An AI health coach that monitors biometrics via wearables, delivers personalized behavior nudges, answers health questions, and coordinates with the care team when escalation is needed.
ideas.target_user: Employer health plans and self-insured employers with 1,000+ employees seeking to reduce chronic disease costs
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Ending Chronic Disease

ideas.title: Developer Tools for AI Agent Observability
ideas.problem: AI agents in production fail silently or unpredictably. Developers have no way to trace agent reasoning, debug multi-step failures, or monitor quality degradation over time.
ideas.concept: An observability platform for AI agents — capturing traces, eval scores, latency, and tool call chains — with alerting, regression detection, and a replay debugger.
ideas.target_user: Engineering teams shipping production AI agents handling real customer workflows
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Braintrust, Langfuse (LLM observability)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Tutoring for Adult Workforce Reskilling
ideas.problem: 40M workers in the US need to reskill for AI-transformed jobs but can't afford or access traditional education. Corporate L&D programs are generic and un-personalized.
ideas.concept: An AI tutor that builds personalized reskilling paths for workers transitioning from at-risk roles — integrating hands-on projects, job-matching, and employer partnerships.
ideas.target_user: Large employers with at-risk workforces and workforce development agencies
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — Create One Million Jobs; Summer 2025 — AI Education

ideas.title: Vertical SaaS for Home Service Businesses
ideas.problem: HVAC, plumbing, and electrical contractors run their entire business from a mix of pen-and-paper, QuickBooks, and disconnected apps — losing 20–30% of revenue to scheduling errors and missed follow-ups.
ideas.concept: An all-in-one field service management platform with AI scheduling, job costing, customer communication, and automated follow-up sequences — built specifically for service trades.
ideas.target_user: Home service businesses with 2–20 technicians and $500K–$5M in annual revenue
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Jobber, ServiceTitan (field service SaaS)

ideas.title: AI Infrastructure for Synthetic Biology
ideas.problem: Synthetic biology experiments require months of trial and error in the lab because there are no AI design tools that predict how genetic circuit modifications will behave in living cells.
ideas.concept: A foundation model trained on genetic sequence-to-phenotype data that predicts how engineered organisms will behave — reducing design-build-test cycles from months to days.
ideas.target_user: Synthetic biology startups and academic labs working on biofuels, therapeutics, and agricultural biotech
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Synthetic Biology Foundation Models

ideas.title: AI-Powered International Payroll & HR
ideas.problem: Startups hiring across 10+ countries face a compliance nightmare — each country has different payroll tax laws, employment contracts, and statutory benefits — managed manually or through expensive EOR firms.
ideas.concept: A global payroll and HR platform where AI handles country-specific tax calculations, compliance filings, contract generation, and benefits enrollment across 50+ countries without an employer of record.
ideas.target_user: Series A–C startups with distributed international teams of 10–200 people
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Deel, Remote (global payroll and HR)

ideas.title: Digital Banking for Underbanked Communities
ideas.problem: 1.4 billion adults globally and 22 million in the US lack access to basic banking — forced to use predatory check cashers and payday lenders charging 200–400% APR.
ideas.concept: A mobile-first neobank with no minimum balance, no monthly fees, instant account opening, earned wage access, and credit-building tools — built specifically for hourly workers.
ideas.target_user: Hourly workers, immigrants, and gig economy participants underserved by traditional banks
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Financial Inclusion; Winter 2025 — Fintech 2.0

ideas.title: Autonomous AI Code Review & Security Scanner
ideas.problem: Security vulnerabilities are introduced faster than human security engineers can review code. SAST tools have 70%+ false positive rates, causing alert fatigue and ignored warnings.
ideas.concept: An AI code review agent that understands business context, identifies real security vulnerabilities with low false positives, suggests production-ready fixes, and learns from developer feedback.
ideas.target_user: Engineering teams at Series B–D companies with 20–200 engineers shipping code daily
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Semgrep, Socket.dev (developer security)

ideas.title: AI Co-pilot for Radiologists
ideas.problem: Radiologists read 50–100 scans per day under growing volume pressure, with error rates of 3–5% and burnout rates exceeding 50% — all while imaging backlogs extend to weeks.
ideas.concept: An AI second-reader that automatically analyzes CT, MRI, and X-ray scans, flags abnormalities with confidence scores, pre-fills report sections, and prioritizes the worklist by acuity.
ideas.target_user: Radiology groups and hospital systems with 5+ radiologists and growing scan volumes
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Rad AI, Nanox (radiology AI)

ideas.title: Zero-Knowledge Proof Infrastructure for Web3
ideas.problem: Blockchain applications need to verify private computations (identity, credit score, medical eligibility) without exposing underlying data — but ZK proof generation is too slow and hard to implement.
ideas.concept: A developer platform that makes ZK proof generation accessible via simple APIs — enabling any web3 developer to add private credential verification without cryptography expertise.
ideas.target_user: Web3 developers building DeFi, identity, and compliance applications
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Aztec, Risc Zero (ZK infrastructure)

ideas.title: AI-Native Customer Data Platform
ideas.problem: Growth-stage companies have customer data scattered across 10–20 tools — Salesforce, Stripe, Intercom, Segment, product analytics — with no unified view to drive personalization or retention decisions.
ideas.concept: An AI-native CDP that syncs all customer data, builds behavioral segments automatically, predicts churn and expansion signals, and pushes actions to the right tool — all without a data team.
ideas.target_user: Head of Growth or CRO at Series A–C SaaS companies with 1K–100K customers
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Segment, Hull (CDPs); AI-native wave coming

ideas.title: Autonomous AI Research Analyst
ideas.problem: Equity research analysts spend 60% of their time gathering and formatting data (earnings models, competitor benchmarks, macro overlays) — leaving 40% for actual analysis and insight generation.
ideas.concept: An AI research analyst that autonomously gathers financial data, builds dynamic models, monitors earnings calls in real time, and generates first-draft research reports for analyst review.
ideas.target_user: Equity research teams at hedge funds, asset managers, and boutique research firms
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — AI-Native Hedge Funds (Charlie Holtz)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Construction Estimating
ideas.problem: Construction estimators manually take off quantities from blueprints — a process taking 2–4 weeks per bid that is 90% repetitive data extraction and 10% judgment.
ideas.concept: An AI estimating platform that reads blueprints and specs, auto-generates material takeoffs, integrates live material pricing, and produces bid packages in hours instead of weeks.
ideas.target_user: General contractors and specialty subcontractors bidding 10–100 projects per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — Next-Generation Construction Technology

ideas.title: AI Platform for Regulatory Affairs in Life Sciences
ideas.problem: FDA submission preparation for drugs and medical devices takes 1–3 years and requires specialized RA consultants charging $300–$500/hr — making compliance a major barrier for small biotechs.
ideas.concept: An AI regulatory affairs platform that analyzes scientific data packages against FDA/EMA guidance, auto-drafts submission sections (IND, 510k, NDA), and tracks review status.
ideas.target_user: Small biotech and medtech companies preparing their first FDA submissions
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Vial, Saama (clinical AI and regulatory)

ideas.title: Smarter Municipal Permitting Software
ideas.problem: Building permits in US cities take 6 months to 2 years to approve — a process that is mostly manual review against checklists that AI could complete in hours.
ideas.concept: An AI permit review system for municipalities that automatically checks submissions against building codes, flags deficiencies, routes to the right reviewer, and tracks timelines.
ideas.target_user: City and county planning departments processing 500–50,000 permit applications per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — AI for Government (Tom Blomfield)

ideas.title: Subscription Infrastructure for Physical Goods
ideas.problem: Brands selling physical subscriptions (supplements, pet food, beauty) churn 6–10% per month because they can't personalize frequency, customize products, or handle pauses gracefully.
ideas.concept: A subscription commerce platform with AI-driven churn prediction, dynamic cadence optimization, personalized product swap recommendations, and an intelligent pause flow — reducing churn by 30–50%.
ideas.target_user: DTC brands with $1M–$20M in subscription revenue on Shopify or Recharge
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Recharge, Skio (subscription management)

ideas.title: AI-First Expense Management for SMBs
ideas.problem: Small business owners manually collect receipts, reconcile credit card statements, and chase employees for expense reports — spending 8–12 hours a month on a task that should take minutes.
ideas.concept: Snap a receipt → AI auto-categorizes, matches to the correct GL account, suggests the expense policy rule, and submits for approval — with QuickBooks sync built in.
ideas.target_user: Business owners and office managers at companies with 5–50 employees and $1M–$20M revenue
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Brex, Ramp, Navan (spend management)

ideas.title: AI-Driven Demand Forecasting for Consumer Brands
ideas.problem: Consumer brands either over-inventory (tying up $100K–$10M in working capital) or stock out (losing 10–15% of revenue) because demand forecasting is done in Excel with 20–30% error rates.
ideas.concept: An AI demand forecasting platform that ingests POS data, marketing spend, social trends, and weather signals to generate SKU-level predictions 30–90 days out — integrated with 3PLs and suppliers.
ideas.target_user: Consumer brand operators with $5M–$100M revenue across 50–500 SKUs
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC Summer 2024 — Supply Chain / Inventory Intelligence

ideas.title: AI Video Ad Creative Platform
ideas.problem: Video ad production costs $5K–$50K per spot and takes 3–8 weeks — making rapid creative testing impossible for growth-stage brands that need 20–50 ad variants per week.
ideas.concept: An AI video ad platform where marketers enter a brief and product URL → AI generates multiple video ad variants with voiceover, music, and CTA — ready for Meta/TikTok/YouTube in 10 minutes.
ideas.target_user: Performance marketing teams at DTC brands and agencies spending $500K–$10M per year on paid social
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — AI-Native Agencies (ad agency use case, Aaron Epstein)

ideas.title: Carbon-Negative Cement Alternative
ideas.problem: Cement production accounts for 8% of global CO2 emissions — 4 billion tons per year. No scalable, cost-competitive alternative exists that meets structural performance standards.
ideas.concept: A supplementary cementitious material derived from industrial byproducts or novel mineral chemistry that replaces 50–80% of Portland cement clinker — reducing embodied carbon by 70% at cost parity.
ideas.target_user: Ready-mix concrete producers and precast manufacturers in large construction markets
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Green Manufacturing (cement/steel decarbonization)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Prior Authorization Automation
ideas.problem: Prior authorization denies or delays 25% of procedures — with 90 million PA requests per year processed by phone calls and fax machines between providers and payers, costing $35B annually.
ideas.concept: An AI agent that automatically submits PA requests with supporting clinical documentation, monitors status, appeals denials with targeted evidence, and integrates with every major EHR.
ideas.target_user: Specialty physician practices (oncology, orthopedics, cardiology) with 5+ providers
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Infinitus, Cohere Health (PA automation)

ideas.title: Real-Time Financial Modeling for Startups
ideas.problem: Startup founders spend 10–20 hours per week updating financial models, board decks, and investor reports manually — slowing decisions and consuming the CEO's most valuable time.
ideas.concept: A financial modeling platform that syncs to QuickBooks, Stripe, and HR data, auto-updates a connected model in real time, and generates investor-ready P&L, cash flow, and runway visualizations.
ideas.target_user: Series A–B startup CEOs and CFOs managing monthly board reporting and fundraising prep
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Runway, Mosaic, Causal (startup financial modeling)

ideas.title: On-Device AI for Industrial IoT
ideas.problem: Industrial equipment (CNC machines, turbines, compressors) generates massive real-time sensor data that can predict failures — but sending it to the cloud introduces dangerous latency and data security risks.
ideas.concept: A hardware-software stack that runs AI inference directly on industrial edge devices — enabling real-time anomaly detection, predictive maintenance, and process optimization without cloud dependency.
ideas.target_user: Industrial manufacturers and utilities with critical equipment fleets worth $10M–$1B
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — US-Based Manufacturing; YC-funded: Augury, SparkCognition

ideas.title: AI-Powered Telehealth for Underserved Specialties
ideas.problem: Wait times for psychiatry, dermatology, and endocrinology average 3–6 months in the US — with 65% of US counties having zero psychiatrists. Rural patients simply go untreated.
ideas.concept: An async telehealth platform for high-demand specialties where AI pre-interviews patients, compiles a structured clinical summary, and enables specialists to review and treat 5x more patients per day.
ideas.target_user: Patients in rural and underserved areas needing specialty care they can't access locally
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC Summer 2024 — Eliminate Middlemen in Healthcare

ideas.title: Robotic Process Automation for SMB Back Office
ideas.problem: Small businesses manually re-enter data between QuickBooks, their CRM, email, and supplier portals dozens of times per week — a task that large enterprises have automated with RPA, but SMBs cannot afford.
ideas.concept: A no-code RPA platform built specifically for SMBs — with pre-built connectors for QuickBooks, Shopify, Gmail, and 50+ common tools — with an AI layer that learns new automations from examples.
ideas.target_user: Small business operators with 5–50 employees wasting 10+ hours per week on data re-entry
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Bardeen, Relay.app (AI workflow automation)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Mortgage Underwriting
ideas.problem: The average mortgage takes 45–60 days to close because underwriting requires manual review of hundreds of documents — a process with 20–30% error rates that adds $10B+ to origination costs.
ideas.concept: An AI underwriting engine that reviews the full loan file in minutes, extracts and validates income, assets, and liabilities, flags policy exceptions, and issues a preliminary decision with confidence scores.
ideas.target_user: Mortgage lenders, credit unions, and banks originating 100–10,000 loans per month
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Better.com, Blend (mortgage tech AI)

ideas.title: B2B Marketplace for Industrial Excess Inventory
ideas.problem: US manufacturers hold $1.1T in excess inventory — obsolete components, cancelled order materials, and surplus stock that sits in warehouses for years before being scrapped.
ideas.concept: A verified B2B marketplace where manufacturers list and buy excess industrial inventory — with AI matching, grade verification, and escrow payment — turning waste into revenue.
ideas.target_user: Plant managers and procurement officers at industrial manufacturers with $10M–$1B in production assets
ideas.market_size: ~$1.1T excess industrial inventory in the US
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC Winter 2025 — US-Based Manufacturing

ideas.title: AI-Native Recruiting Platform for Technical Roles
ideas.problem: Engineering hiring takes 3–6 months at most companies — sourcing is manual, technical screens are slow, and the best candidates accept other offers while processes drag.
ideas.concept: An AI recruiting platform that sources, screens, and ranks technical candidates using real skills signals (GitHub, open source, take-home projects) — cutting time-to-hire from months to weeks.
ideas.target_user: Engineering hiring managers at high-growth startups hiring 10–100 engineers per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Karat, Qualified.io (technical recruiting)

ideas.title: Ambient AI Scribe for Primary Care
ideas.problem: Primary care physicians spend 2–3 hours per day on documentation — charting in the EHR after hours, contributing to 50%+ burnout rates and reducing patient-facing time by 40%.
ideas.concept: An ambient AI that listens to patient encounters, generates a structured SOAP note in real time, pre-populates the EHR with diagnoses, medications, and orders — reviewed and signed in 30 seconds.
ideas.target_user: Primary care physicians and family medicine practices with 1–20 providers
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Nabla, Suki (ambient clinical AI)

ideas.title: AI-Native Insurance Claims Processing
ideas.problem: P&C insurance claims take 15–60 days to settle due to manual adjuster workflows, slow document review, and fraud screening delays — creating 40% customer churn post-claim.
ideas.concept: An AI claims automation platform that triages incoming claims, extracts loss details from photos and documents, validates against policy terms, calculates indemnity, and issues payment within 24 hours.
ideas.target_user: Regional P&C insurers and MGAs processing 10,000–500,000 claims per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Tractable, Snapsheet (AI claims automation)

ideas.title: Satellite-Based Crop Insurance Platform
ideas.problem: Traditional crop insurance requires manual farm visits for loss verification — a process taking months that fails smallholder farmers who need rapid payouts to buy next season's seeds.
ideas.concept: An index-based crop insurance product using satellite NDVI and weather data to automatically trigger and settle claims within 72 hours — no farm visit required.
ideas.target_user: Smallholder farmers in climate-vulnerable regions and agricultural lenders requiring risk coverage
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Climate Resilience / Agricultural Insurance

ideas.title: AI-Powered Customer Success Platform
ideas.problem: SaaS customer success teams manage 50–200 accounts per CSM with no real-time signal on which accounts are at risk — churn is discovered in retrospect, not predicted.
ideas.concept: An AI CS platform that monitors product usage, support tickets, and engagement signals in real time, predicts churn 45 days out, auto-drafts outreach playbooks, and surfaces expansion opportunities.
ideas.target_user: VP of Customer Success at B2B SaaS companies with $5M–$50M ARR and 50–500 customers
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Gainsight, ChurnZero (CS platforms); AI-native wave

ideas.title: AI Model for Structural Engineering Analysis
ideas.problem: Structural engineers manually calculate loads and review designs on every project — a process taking days that must be redone for every design iteration, slowing construction timelines by weeks.
ideas.concept: An AI structural analysis copilot that reads CAD files, auto-runs load calculations, identifies code violations, suggests member sizing optimizations, and generates stamped-ready reports.
ideas.target_user: Mid-sized structural engineering firms handling 50–500 commercial building projects per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — Next-Generation Construction (AI engineering tools)

ideas.title: AI Personalization Engine for E-Commerce
ideas.problem: E-commerce brands spend millions on traffic but convert 2–3% of visitors. Product recommendations are powered by rudimentary collaborative filtering that doesn't adapt to real-time behavior.
ideas.concept: An AI personalization layer that adapts homepage, product rankings, promotions, and email content to each visitor's real-time session behavior — increasing conversion rates by 20–40%.
ideas.target_user: E-commerce brands with $5M–$100M in GMV using Shopify or Magento
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Intelligems, Dynamic Yield (ecommerce AI)

ideas.title: AI-Native Laboratory Information System (LIS)
ideas.problem: Clinical labs use 20–30 year old LIS software with no AI capabilities — manual result review, slow turnaround reporting, and zero predictive analytics for lab directors managing quality.
ideas.concept: A modern, cloud-native LIS with AI anomaly detection on results, auto-reporting of critical values, predictive instrument failure alerts, and a natural language analytics layer for lab directors.
ideas.target_user: Independent clinical labs and hospital lab directors processing 1M–50M tests per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: lab diagnostics AI stack

ideas.title: Autonomous Vehicle Fleet Management Software
ideas.problem: AV and robotaxi companies are deploying fleets without purpose-built fleet management software — relying on modified automotive fleet tools that don't account for sensor health, ODD compliance, or disengagement tracking.
ideas.concept: A fleet management OS built specifically for autonomous vehicles — monitoring sensor health, managing remote assistance operators, tracking ODD compliance, and generating NHTSA-required reports.
ideas.target_user: AV deployment companies, robotaxi operators, and autonomous trucking fleets with 10–10,000 vehicles
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: AV infrastructure and tooling

ideas.title: AI-Native CPG Product Development Platform
ideas.problem: Consumer packaged goods companies take 18–24 months to launch a new product — formulation, consumer testing, and regulatory review are entirely sequential and manual.
ideas.concept: An AI platform that generates novel formulations based on market trends and consumer insight data, predicts consumer acceptance, and auto-generates ingredient regulatory compliance reports.
ideas.target_user: Product development teams at mid-market CPG companies launching 5–20 new products per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Sustainable Food Systems; adjacent to YC biotech bets

ideas.title: Infrastructure for AI Agent Payments
ideas.problem: AI agents increasingly need to make payments, subscriptions, and micro-transactions autonomously — but current payment infrastructure requires human authentication and is not designed for machine-to-machine flows.
ideas.concept: A payment infrastructure layer designed for AI agents: scoped API keys with spend limits, per-task payment authorization, audit logs for every agent transaction, and human approval for large amounts.
ideas.target_user: Developers building autonomous AI agents that need to spend money to complete tasks
ideas.market_size: Emerging — AI agent economy projected at $100B+ by 2030
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — New Financial Primitives for AI-native workflows

ideas.title: Mental Health Data Platform for Employers
ideas.problem: US employers spend $300B+ annually on mental health costs but have no data on which interventions work for their workforce — buying EAP programs with 3–5% utilization and no outcome metrics.
ideas.concept: A HIPAA-compliant mental health analytics platform that aggregates anonymous employee mental health data, measures EAP and therapy outcomes, and gives HR data to optimize their benefits spend.
ideas.target_user: Chief People Officers and benefits directors at self-insured employers with 1,000–50,000 employees
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Spring Health, Lyra Health (workplace mental health)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Knowledge Management for Professional Services
ideas.problem: Law firms, consulting firms, and accounting firms re-create the same work products from scratch every engagement — thousands of hours of institutional knowledge locked in unstructured documents.
ideas.concept: A knowledge management system that organizes prior work products, surfaces relevant precedents when starting new projects, and enables AI-assisted first drafts — trained on the firm's own work.
ideas.target_user: Knowledge management and practice group leaders at professional services firms with 50–5,000 employees
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Spring 2026 — AI-Native Agencies; YC-funded: Notion, Guru (KM)

ideas.title: On-Demand Manufacturing Network
ideas.problem: Hardware startups and SMBs needing CNC machining, injection molding, or PCB fabrication must contact 10–20 vendors, wait days for quotes, and vet suppliers themselves — adding weeks to timelines.
ideas.concept: A manufacturing marketplace that instantly matches production jobs to vetted shop floors — with AI DFM analysis, real-time quoting, and quality-guaranteed delivery.
ideas.target_user: Hardware startups, product companies, and procurement teams needing 1–1,000 part production runs
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Xometry, Fictiv (on-demand manufacturing)

ideas.title: AI-Driven Compliance Monitoring for Fintechs
ideas.problem: Fintechs operating in lending, payments, and banking spend 15–20% of revenue on compliance — hiring armies of compliance officers to monitor transactions, review policies, and file regulatory reports.
ideas.concept: An AI compliance monitoring platform that continuously screens transactions for AML/fraud signals, auto-generates SAR narratives, tracks regulatory changes, and maintains a compliance audit trail.
ideas.target_user: CFOs and CCOs at fintech companies with $10M–$500M in transaction volume
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Alloy, Unit21 (fintech compliance automation)

ideas.title: AI Platform for ESG Reporting
ideas.problem: Fortune 1000 companies face mandatory ESG disclosure requirements (SEC climate rules, CSRD in Europe) with no automated data collection — ESG teams manually gather data from 500+ internal systems.
ideas.concept: An AI ESG data platform that auto-collects emissions, water, and labor data from enterprise systems, calculates metrics against GHG Protocol and GRI standards, and generates investor-ready reports.
ideas.target_user: Chief Sustainability Officers and ESG/IR teams at public companies and large private companies
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Watershed, Persefoni (climate and ESG reporting)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Fleet Electrification Planner
ideas.problem: Trucking, delivery, and government fleet operators want to electrify but don't know where to start — which routes can go electric first, what charging infrastructure is needed, and what the ROI is.
ideas.concept: A fleet electrification planning tool that analyzes telematics data, models EV total cost of ownership vs diesel, plans charging depot siting, and generates a phased transition roadmap.
ideas.target_user: Fleet managers and CFOs at companies with 50–5,000 vehicles considering electrification
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Electric Vehicles and Clean Transportation

ideas.title: Foundation Model for Materials Discovery
ideas.problem: Discovering new materials for batteries, semiconductors, and catalysts requires searching a near-infinite chemical space — a 10–15 year experimental process that AI can dramatically accelerate.
ideas.concept: A materials science foundation model trained on crystal structures, DFT calculations, and experimental data that predicts novel material properties and candidate synthesis routes.
ideas.target_user: Battery startups, semiconductor companies, and materials R&D labs needing to find new compounds
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Citrine Informatics, Orbital Materials (AI for materials)

ideas.title: AI-Native Order Management for Multi-Channel Commerce
ideas.problem: Brands selling on Amazon, Shopify, wholesale, and retail manage orders across 5–10 systems with no unified view — overselling, delayed fulfillment, and reconciliation errors eat 3–5% of margin.
ideas.concept: A real-time AI order management hub that syncs inventory across all channels, auto-routes orders to the optimal fulfillment node, predicts stockouts, and reconciles all channels into one ledger.
ideas.target_user: Multi-channel consumer brands with $5M–$100M in GMV selling across 3+ channels
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Linnworks, Skubana (order management)

ideas.title: AI Copilot for Tax Compliance (SMB & Mid-Market)
ideas.problem: US corporate tax compliance costs small and mid-market businesses $140B annually — most of it preparing routine returns that follow established rules AI could handle end-to-end.
ideas.concept: An AI tax compliance platform that connects to accounting systems, identifies elections and deductions, prepares federal and state returns, and flags items needing CPA review — at 1/10th the cost of a firm.
ideas.target_user: CFOs and controllers at companies with $5M–$100M in revenue and complex multi-state tax filings
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Pilot, Taxdome (SMB accounting and tax)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Pension & Benefits Administration
ideas.problem: Mid-market companies spend $2,000–$5,000 per employee per year administering 401(k), pension, and benefits plans — a process dominated by legacy software and manual HR operations.
ideas.concept: An AI benefits administration platform that automates enrollment, compliance testing (ADP/ACP), 5500 filing, and employee communication — replacing a $3M/year administration burden.
ideas.target_user: HR directors and CFOs at companies with 100–2,500 employees self-administering retirement benefits
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Vestwell, ForUsAll (retirement platform)

ideas.title: Predictive Analytics for Sports Injury Prevention
ideas.problem: Professional and collegiate sports teams lose $1B+ annually to preventable soft-tissue injuries — existing wearable data is collected but rarely analyzed with predictive models.
ideas.concept: An AI sports science platform that integrates wearable load data, GPS tracking, sleep, and wellness scores to predict injury risk 7–14 days ahead — with personalized training modification recommendations.
ideas.target_user: Athletic trainers and performance directors at professional teams and D1 college programs
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Kitman Labs, Fusionetics (athlete health AI)

ideas.title: AI Infrastructure for Robotic Process Automation in Healthcare
ideas.problem: Healthcare's back office — prior auth, eligibility checks, claims, scheduling — runs on fax and phone calls because existing RPA tools break on the unstructured, non-standard systems in use.
ideas.concept: An AI-native healthcare RPA platform that uses computer vision and LLMs to interact with any legacy healthcare system — navigating payer portals, entering data, and extracting results without API integrations.
ideas.target_user: Revenue cycle managers and IT directors at health systems and large medical groups
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Infinitus, Thoughtful AI (healthcare RPA)

ideas.title: Liquid Cooling Infrastructure for AI Data Centers
ideas.problem: AI GPU clusters generate 10–100x more heat per rack than traditional servers — air cooling is physically impossible at scale, yet most data centers are still air-cooled with inefficient designs.
ideas.concept: A direct liquid cooling (DLC) solution designed for dense AI GPU clusters — delivering cooling as a modular service with monitoring hardware, installation, and ongoing management.
ideas.target_user: Data center operators and hyperscalers upgrading to H100/H200 GPU clusters exceeding 100kW per rack
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — AI Infrastructure; YC-funded: LiquidStack adjacent

ideas.title: AI Platform for Social Determinants of Health
ideas.problem: Healthcare spends $3.8T treating diseases that are 80% caused by social factors (housing, food, transportation) — but providers have no system to screen for or address these needs at scale.
ideas.concept: A platform that screens patients for social needs at the point of care, connects them to community resources, and tracks resolution — with analytics for value-based care contracts.
ideas.target_user: ACOs, FQHCs, and health systems participating in value-based care contracts with SDOH requirements
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Healthcare's Biggest Problems (SDOH)

ideas.title: AI System for Science Peer Review Acceleration
ideas.problem: Peer review takes 6–18 months on average, creating a massive bottleneck in scientific progress — reviewers are overloaded volunteers with no tools to efficiently evaluate submissions.
ideas.concept: An AI peer review assistant that checks statistical methodology, detects inconsistencies, summarizes prior literature context, identifies potential conflicts of interest, and drafts structured review frameworks.
ideas.target_user: Academic journal editors and scientific societies managing 5,000–500,000 submissions per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Summer 2024 — Scientific Discovery AI; YC-adjacent: AI for research

ideas.title: AI-Native Immigration Intelligence for Enterprises
ideas.problem: Large enterprises with 500–5,000 visa holders have no real-time visibility into their immigration compliance exposure — policy changes happen daily and manual tracking fails employees at the worst moments.
ideas.concept: An enterprise immigration intelligence platform that tracks every employee's visa status, flags compliance risks from policy changes, automates renewal timelines, and coordinates with outside counsel.
ideas.target_user: Global mobility managers and legal ops teams at multinationals with 500+ foreign national employees
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: YC-funded category: Envoy Global, WorkPerk (enterprise immigration)

ideas.title: AI-Powered Learning Platform for Vocational Trades
ideas.problem: The US faces a 3-million-person skilled trades shortage (electricians, plumbers, HVAC techs, welders) — trade schools use 1980s-era curriculum with no adaptive learning or simulation training.
ideas.concept: An AI learning platform for trade apprentices that delivers adaptive curriculum, AR-guided practice simulations, code and safety compliance quizzes, and progress tracking for journeyman certification.
ideas.target_user: Trade unions, apprenticeship programs, and vocational schools training 100–10,000 apprentices per year
ideas.yc_rfs_reference: Winter 2025 — Create One Million Jobs; Spring 2026 — AI Guidance for Physical Work
